text: ان الذين سبقت لهم منا الحسنى او۟لئك عنها مبعدون

translations.translation: Those for whom the Best from Us was pre-ordained, will be far away from it.
But those for whom a good reward had been fore-ordained by Us, will be far removed from it,
But for those whom We had decided to favour with good reward, they shall be kept far removed from Hell.
But those to whom We have already promised blessings will be far away from hell.
Indeed those to whom Our promise of goodness has been made, have been kept far away from hell.
Verily, those for whom the good has preceded from Us, they will be removed far therefrom (Hell).
Surely (as for) those for whom the good has already gone forth from Us, they shall be kept far off from it;
But as for those unto whom already the reward most fair has gone forth from Us,
Lo! those unto whom kindness hath gone forth before from Us, they will be far removed from thence.
But those who have been promised a good reward by Us will be kept far away from Hell --
Verily those for whom the good reward hath preceded from Us, they therefrom shall be kept far away.
Indeed those to whom there has gone beforehand [the promise of] the best reward from Us will be kept away from it.
Those for whom the good (record) from Us has gone before, will be removed far therefrom.
Verily those for whom the good has preceded from Us, they will be removed far therefrom (Hell) [e.g. 'Iesa (Jesus), son of Maryam (Mary); 'Uzair (Ezra), etc.].
But those whom We have surpassed with the finest (rank) from Us shall be far removed from it,
As for those who deserved goodness from Us—these will be kept away from it.
Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
[21:101] Indeed those to whom [the promise of] the best reward, the [best] status, went beforehand from Us, and among such are those who have just been mentioned: they will be kept away from it.

(Lo! those unto whom kindness hath gone forth before) those to whom Paradise has been enjoined; the reference here is to Ezra and Jesus (from Us, they will be far removed from thence) they will be saved from the Fire.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: نزل بعده: { إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتْ لَهُمْ } عنايةٌ { مِّنَّا } الخصلة { ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ } والمنزلة الأسنى والدرجة العليا، والجنة المأوى { أُوْلَـٰئِكَ } السعداء المخصوصون بمزيد لطفنا وجودنا { عَنْهَا } أي: عن النار { مُبْعَدُونَ } [الأنبياء: 101] لسبق رحمتنا إياهم وعفونا عنهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحقّ جلّ جلاله: { إِن الذين سبقت لهم منا الحسنى } أي: الخصلة الحسنى، أو المشيئة الحسنى، وهي السعادة، أو التوفيق للطاعة، أو البُشرى بالثواب، { أولئك عنها }: عن جهنم { مبعدون } لأنهم في الجنة، وشتان ما بينهما
 قال القشيري: لم يقل متباعدون ليَعْلَم العابدون أن المدارَ على التقدير وسبق الحكم من الله، لا على تَبَاعد العبد وتَقَرُّبه
 هـ
 وكأنه يشير لقوله: " هؤلاء إلى الجنَّةِ ولا أُبالي " ، أي: بأعمالهم
